item.title: How Hugo Aguilar Ortiz Became Mexico’s Most Powerful Indigenous Lawyer
item.description: Hugo Aguilar Ortiz grew up in a remote Mixtec-speaking village. He is now one of the most powerful lawyers in Mexico.

item.title: U.K. to Ban Palestine Action Group as Terrorist Organization
item.description: The British government announced plans to proscribe Palestine Action after members broke into a military air base.

item.title: As Black New Yorkers Move Out, N.Y.C. Politics May Be Reshaped
item.description: Housing affordability and quality-of-life concerns are pushing longtime Black New Yorkers out of the city, underscoring Democrats’ challenges with the...

item.title: Supreme Court to Hear Rastafarian Prisoner’s Suit Over Shaved Dreadlocks

item.title: Vera Rubin Telescope Quickly Found 1,200 New Asteroids
item.description: The Vera C. Rubin Observatory is expected to find millions of unknown objects in our solar system, and perhaps even a mysterious Planet Nine.
